page.title: 10Burgess Hill BMX Bombers
page.content: The town's BMX Club is called{Burgess {Hill Bombers BMX Club.}It is in Maple Drive, Leyands Park.The Club meets every fortnight in the summer. There are about{six hundred and fifty riders {already. The Club was started by a lady called Mrs Cooke, who thought it would be a good idea. The Council and firms gave money to build the BMX}track. There was sponsored riding across the downs and jumble sales to raise money for the Club. There are{points meetings,}which are held on some of the Sundays. The person with the most points from all the points meetings wins a trophy. On the rest of the Sundays there are {trophy meetings,}at which the first three are presented with a trophy.
